first_para: Iain McKenzie (born 4 April 1959) is a Scottish Labour politician, who has been the Member of Parliament for Inverclyde since the June 2011 by-election in his constituency.

full.extract: Iain McKenzie (born 4 April 1959) is a Scottish Labour politician, who has been the Member of Parliament for Inverclyde since the June 2011 by-election in his constituency.
full.title: Iain McKenzie
